title: Selling  T206  Bill Carrigan  Low Grade  Diff backs
author: Donscards

posts.post_title: Selling  T206  Bill Carrigan  Low Grade  Diff backs
posts.post_content: I purchased the Bill Carrigan collection from Rawn Hill (former Net 54 Member)  Over 50 cards  T206 with diff backs incl American Beauty--T205--Cracker Jacks  T202--Silk--  Helmer Stamp--Tom Barker etc.  some cut autos too--I will list a low grade first---check the scans  Tolstoi back with tape (torn)  $15--Sovereigh back pin hole  $20--Piedmont $15---shipping is $2.00---I will list more later  thanks,  Don
Ok Sean  I will put those aside for you  thanks,  Don
Piedmont T206 Carrigan reduced to $12 del.  thanks,  Don
